name: Do-Ahead Stuffing
author: BETSY0511
summary: This is a delicious stuffing recipe that can be made up to 3 days ahead.  Just mix the ingredients together and store in the fridge.
ingredients: 2 cups chicken broth, or as needed
directions: Melt the butter in a large deep skillet over medium heat
Add celery and onion; cook and stir until tender, about 10 minutes
Blend in the bread crumbs, salt, poultry seasoning, pepper, thyme and sage
Stir in enough chicken broth to moisten
Spoon into large resealable bags and refrigerate for up to 3 days
To bake, preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Place the stuffing into greased casserole dishes
Bake for 45 minutes in the preheated oven
If stuffing a bird, cook according to the recipe for your bird and place any extra stuffing into a casserole dish to bake
